alert.note: Alert for Roberts (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 6:36AM MDT until May 09 at 7:00AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Traverse County in west central Minnesota... Northeastern Roberts County in northeastern South Dakota... * Until 800 AM CDT. * At 736 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Halls Landing, or 9 miles southwest of Wheaton, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Silver Bridge around 740 AM CDT. Rosholt and Mud Lake Landing around 745 AM CDT. Wheaton around 750 AM CDT. Whiterock Colony around 755 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Immanuel Church. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
